name: Thinking + Research Framework
description: Evidence-based systematic problem-solving system: A comprehensive collection combining thinking-framework (systematic thinking methodologies) and web-research (evidence gathering) for data-driven decision-making
author: tempuss

collections.name: thinking-research-framework
collections.description: A comprehensive problem-solving system combining thinking-framework (15 systematic thinking methodologies) with web-research (evidence-based validation). Adds real data to logical analysis to support high-confidence decision-making.

packages.reason: Provides 15 systematic thinking methodologies: problem definition, root cause analysis, innovation, strategic planning, process improvement, decision-making, and synthesis
Evidence-based validation: Market data, technical documentation, competitive analysis, and user research for real-world verification

keyFeatures: Optimized research strategies by problem type
Can be used independently without dependencies

installation.note:
Framework usage options:
1. Collection: Install both for integrated workflow
2. Individual: Use each independently as needed
